nodes.text: The Stennes sector was a sector that contained the planet Stennaros.

While the Stennes sector originated from a canon source, Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, revealed during discussions about The Essential Atlas Online Companion that the sector was dropped at Lucasfilm's request to avoid confusion with the Stenness Node. Stennaros was then placed in the Har Worlds sector of the Expansion Region.
